repairedDockerfile:
FROM alpine:3.10
# Author with no obligation to maintain
LABEL author="Paul TÃ¶tterman <paul.totterman@iki.fi>"

ENV DBHOST="mariadb" \
    DBNAME="racktables" \
    DBUSER="racktables" \
    DBPASS=""

COPY entrypoint.sh /entrypoint.sh
RUN apk --no-cache add \
    ca-certificates \
    curl \
    php7-bcmath \
    php7-curl \
    php7-fpm \
    php7-gd \
    php7-json \
    php7-ldap \
    php7-mbstring \
    php7-pcntl \
    php7-pdo_mysql \
    php7-session \
    php7-snmp \
    && chmod +x /entrypoint.sh \
    && curl -f -sSLo /racktables.tar.gz 'https://github.com/RackTables/racktables/archive/RackTables-0.21.3.tar.gz' \
    && tar -xz -C /opt -f /racktables.tar.gz \
    && mv /opt/racktables-RackTables-0.21.3 /opt/racktables \
    && rm -f /racktables.tar.gz \
    && sed -i \
    -e 's|^listen =.*$|listen = 9000|' \
    /etc/php7/php-fpm.d/www.conf \
    && sed -i \
    -e 's|^;daemonize = .*|daemonize = no|' \
    /etc/php7/php-fpm.conf

VOLUME /opt/racktables/wwwroot
EXPOSE 9000
ENTRYPOINT ["/entrypoint.sh"]
CMD ["/usr/sbin/php-fpm7"]
